title: Strictly viewers 'scarred' by Mike's 'painful' performance dressed as a rabbit
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing fans were horrified tonight as they watched Mike Bushell dressed up as a rabbit.

Sports presenter Mike performed the tango with his partner Katya Jones - but his attempts did not impress viewers.

They performed to What You Waiting For in an Alice in Wonderland themed number.

Viewers predicted the dance would send Mike home, while the judges only gave the performance 26 points.

(Image: BBC)

One viewer tweeted: "I’m scarred. What was that".

Another pointed out: "Mike wasn't awful, but he's a whole level below everyone else so it's time for him to go.

"But he's really putting the effort in, and is getting better as the competition goes on".

(Image: BBC)

"Time to send the bunny back into the wild! That was a painful Tango to watch", said a third.

"I think it’s safe to say who’s going home this week..." said another, shortly after their performance.

Others questioned the judge's score, claiming they were given more points than they deserved.

One wrote: "Once again overscored! No way was Mike better than Chris! His posture was terrible, his timing off in several parts, a few mistakes in his footwork etc".

(Image: BBC)

"So Craig gave a 5 to Emma & Anton but a 6 to Mike & Katya. Beyond explanation" said another.

Will Bayley and Janette Manrara were both forced to pull out of the live show on doctor's orders after Will injured his leg.

Professional dancer Neil Jones was also unable to perform due to injury, and was replaced by Kevin Clifton who danced with Alex Scott insead.
description: Strictly Come Dancing fans were horrified by Mike's performance tonight, with many questioning the judges "overscoring" him
